He left an indelible mark in New York City and San Francisco, building a love affair with both cities’ fans.","popularity":7.436,"poster_path":"/qdrTY7HVnR22GONaHup42xkAVd1.jpg","release_date":"2022-10-27","title":"Say Hey, Willie Mays!","video":false,"vote_average":6.375,"vote_count":8},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/nCmJnariQQUhdXMlijgokll57YH.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":391301,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Phi Slama Jama","overview":"Winning is never a slam dunk. They were the most popular fraternity on the campus of college basketball in the early 1980's. Led by a Nigerian soccer player named Hakeem Olajuwon and a lightly recruited hometown kid named Clyde Drexler, the University of Houston Cougars not only electrified the NCAA Final Four with three straight appearances (1982-84), but they also helped transform the game itself. Director Chip Rives brings back the high-flying circus act under ringmaster Guy V. Lewis and spins a tale of true greatness and crushing heartbreak.","popularity":3.507,"poster_path":"/61U7kN31tdmgH67yIMf4qiMSZkn.jpg","release_date":"2016-10-04","title":"Phi Slama Jama","video":false,"vote_average":6.5,"vote_count":6},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/qOBrGiqFeAf7mvgMobcAPWYG4lK.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":10959,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Das Wunder von Bern - Die wahre Geschichte","overview":"","popularity":1.84,"poster_path":"/hFXfyJyfvlKOJKd3kZB9c4uN0om.jpg","release_date":"2004-04-27","title":"Das Wunder von Bern - Die wahre Geschichte","video":false,"vote_average":6.3,"vote_count":3},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":393718,"original_language":"de","original_title":"Dirty Games: Das Geschäft mit dem Sport","overview":"An expedition to the dirty abyss of professional sports. In addition to showing how the two groups come from very different cultures, the documentary showcases what playing the game means to the members of both teams, and displays how passionate the fans of these two squads are.","popularity":2.654,"poster_path":"/b9CRiTeO404SX6BNSLlQfBtwyuD.jpg","release_date":"2008-02-10","title":"Football Under Cover","video":false,"vote_average":6.3,"vote_count":3},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":865623,"original_language":"de","original_title":"Im Westen ging die Sonne auf","overview":"The mining industry, which always had been “sponsor” and “financier” of the soccer clubs in the Ruhr valley during the post-war period, doesn’t exist anymore nowadays in that form. Many of the once glorious clubs which dominated German soccer until the 1970s faded into obscurity without financial backers.\r The documentary “Im Westen ging die Sonne auf\" (\"The sun had risen in the west“) shows the history of the “Revierfußball” from after the second World War until the decline of the mining industry and recalls legendary players and forgotten clubs. The film shows especially how deeply rooted the sport was back then in the entire lifestyle of the Ruhr area - in private life as well as in society - and how structural change also left clearly visible marks in sports.  With pictures from back then, interviews with contemporary witnesses, and footage of original locations nowadays, a contemporary document of German post-war history, by taking the example of soccer, has been created.","popularity":5.515,"poster_path":"/exzHJHAuCCaGli5uxqTAxaTNBbw.jpg","release_date":"2002-10-22","title":"Im Westen ging die Sonne auf","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":704317,"original_language":"pt","original_title":"Nada Vai Nos Separar - Os Cem Anos do S.C. Internacional","overview":"It tells the love story of the union of a team and its fans over a hundred years. It is not a film to just narrate facts about Sport Club Internacional or show goals. Everyone was sure: They will get relegated immediately again! But everything turned out differently! The underdog club gave Cottbus — which was to many only known from scare stories about lack of prospects and unemployment – joy, hope, and pride. In an unmissable sit-down in the lead-up to the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022, an unguarded Messi opens up about life beyond the field, touching on family, the future, and what dreams lie ahead.","popularity":2.681,"poster_path":"/rcFpKzoCOMdZp6pJYu5nBFYHhrN.jpg","release_date":"2022-10-05","title":"En Primera Persona: Lionel Messi","video":false,"vote_average":8.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":402046,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Bobby","overview":"A film which marks the 50th anniversary of England's victory in the 1966 World Cup, and uncovers the truth behind the man who led them to it... Bo66y is a powerful, dramatic and deeply personal portrait of a genuine footballing icon. Moore fought many battles besides those witnessed by millions on the football field. Behind the glory lies the story of a man who faced highs and lows with the same strength and bravery. But he died young, cruelly shunned by the game and by the very people who owed him so much. The story is told by his two wives, his friends and fans, including Pele, Sir Geoff Hurst Harry Redknapp, Ray Davies, Ray Winstone and Russell Brand, and more than 30 others, whose words are mixed with as yet unseen archive footage.","popularity":3.137,"poster_path":"/5xcoj09VeOrG5hxqG4PcVSDeT9G.jpg","release_date":"2016-05-27","title":"Bobby","video":false,"vote_average":6.5,"vote_count":20},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/68c4U4lkcQkFscB0vQL6oHPCcXz.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":712825,"original_language":"fr","original_title":"Les Joueuses #Paslàpourdanser","overview":"The Olympique Lyonnais women's football team has over the years become one of the best football teams in the world. An invitation to see women's sports and the place they hold in professional sports under a new light: a universe where the values of respect and open-mindedness are indispensable mainstays in working towards equality.","popularity":4.425,"poster_path":"/pQXmeotnnPiB1fZxBCXzEsvTlNK.jpg","release_date":"2020-09-02","title":"Les Joueuses #Paslàpourdanser","video":false,"vote_average":5.0,"vote_count":6},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/h9KjB6sFY604tJP3vxVYTDdhpwr.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":247720,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Ghosts of Ole Miss","overview":"In the fall of 1962, a dramatic series of events made Civil Rights history and changed a way of life. On the eve of James Meredith becoming the first African-American to attend class at the University of Mississippi, the campus erupted into a night of rioting between those opposed to the integration of the school and those trying to enforce it.
